== MacroDebugStep

=== Properties



.token: string;
Debug token, previously generated by a call to the admin verb 'livedebugToken'


.type: MacroDebugStepType;
Step type


=== Source

[source,typescript,linenums]
----
interface MacroDebugStep {

  /**
   * Debug token, previously generated by a call to the admin verb 'livedebugToken'
   */
  token: string;

  /**
   * Step type
   */
  type: MacroDebugStepType;

}
----
